forum.name: anycon planning
forum.description: planning board for the annual anycon event.
forum.latestCommentText: i want to point out that it isn't yet finished, but the floor plan won't change.

thread.title: area organization

comments.text: hey, everyone! just wanted to ask quickly how we want to organize the anycon world. personally, i think there should be a landing site/ hub that sends you to a sub-area that has...
one or two categories of entries and booths. i'll write up a document outining this organization, but let me know if there's a better way. i envision this as a ces style event...
but let me know if i'm just totally missing something!    cheers, doc

thread.latestCommentText: but let me know if i'm just totally missing something!    cheers, doc
